'''Genesis''' is the first book of the Torah and the Hebrew Bible. It tells the story of the Creation of the universe and man by God, the Fall of mankind and their expulsion from the Garden of Eden, the story of [[Noah]], [[Cain]] and [[Abel]], the testing of [[Abraham]]'s faith by God, and the founding of [[Israel]]. It is followed by [[Exodus]].
